mapper.select: select * from shengka order by price
select * from shengka where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by price
select * from shengka where price <300 order by price
select * from shengka where price >=300 and price <500 order by price
select * from shengka where price >=500 and price <1000 order by price
select * from shengka where price >=1000 order by price
select * from shengka where one like concat('%',#{one},'%') order by price
select * from shengka where two like concat('%',#{two},'%') order by price
select * from shengka where three like concat('%',#{three},'%') order by price
select * from shengka where four like concat('%',#{four},'%') order by price
